### Classes

* [`augeasproviders::instances`](#augeasproviders--instances): An alternative way to create resources for all augeasproviders types.

## Classes

### <a name="augeasproviders--instances"></a>`augeasproviders::instances`

This class provides an alternative way to create resources for all of the
augeasproviders types. Instead of creating the resources directly, you can
instead pass hashes of resources to this class. This is especially useful
when you want to create these resources from Hiera.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `augeasproviders::instances` class:

* [`apache_directive_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--apache_directive_hash)
* [`apache_setenv_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--apache_setenv_hash)
* [`host_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--host_hash)
* [`kernel_parameter_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--kernel_parameter_hash)
* [`mailalias_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--mailalias_hash)
* [`mounttab_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--mounttab_hash)
* [`nrpe_command_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--nrpe_command_hash)
* [`pam_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--pam_hash)
* [`pg_hba_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--pg_hba_hash)
* [`puppet_auth_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--puppet_auth_hash)
* [`shellvar_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--shellvar_hash)
* [`ssh_config_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--ssh_config_hash)
* [`sshd_config_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--sshd_config_hash)
* [`sshd_config_subsystem_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--sshd_config_subsystem_hash)
* [`sysctl_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--sysctl_hash)
* [`syslog_hash`](#-augeasproviders--instances--syslog_hash)
* [`resource_defaults`](#-augeasproviders--instances--resource_defaults)

##### <a name="-augeasproviders--instances--apache_directive_hash"></a>`apache_directive_hash`

Data type: `Hash[String, Hash]`

Hash of apache_directive resources to create.

Default value: `{}`

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-augeasproviders--instances--resource_defaults"></a>`resource_defaults`

Data type: `Hash[String, Hash]`

Default value: `$augeasproviders::params::resource_defaults`

### <a name="augeasproviders--params"></a>`augeasproviders::params`
